title: Arisu - CLI Configuration
description: The configuration file that any CI/CD environment or the CLI can pick up and validate.

project.description: Returns the project to use when using continous integration or the CLI.

accessToken.description: Returns the access token to push project resources without any security risks. This can also be under the `ARISU_ACCESS_TOKEN` environment variable.

repository.description: Returns the GitHub repository as `user/project` the CLI can pick up and send a PubSub event to the GitHub bot to sync your translations.

files.description: This is a list of files the CLI can pick up to sync your translations with. This can be a glob-style path.

enabled.description: If the GitHub system for Arisu is enabled or not. By default, it is disabled.

branches.description: Returns a list of branches to sync up your translations with.

commitMessage.description: Returns the commit message you want to set.
